fields.physical_description:
Turcoman carpet, Afghanistan

WARP: dark grey wool; Z2S; 15 warp threads per inch (60 per dm).

WEFT: red and brown wool; Z-spun, unplied; 2 shoots after each row of knots, one of red weft and one of brown; 10 knots per inch (40 per dm).

PILE: wool; 8 colours: red, light red, yellow, green, dark blue, blue, brown, white; asymmetrical knot open to the right and tied around 2 threads; 75 knots per sq. inch (1200 per dm).

SIDE FINISH: 3 cords overcast with red wool.

END FINISH: lower: max. 12 cms. plain weave in red/blue bands with 2 passes of light red/blue weft-twining at the bottom.  Fringe of loose warp threads 18 cms. long.  Upper: max. 10 cms. plain weave in red/dark blue bands.  Fringe of loose warp threads 16 cms. long.

DESIGN: Field: red ground with central row of three octagons, each formed by 3 concentric flower-filled borders.  Along both sides is a row of 4 small octagons of 2 concentric border.  The upper and middle octagon each has a diamond bearing stylised flowers; the lower has large and small flowers.  The small octagons have tiny flowers or stars within them.  The large octagons lie within a diamond with flowers in the corners and with tiny botehs.  From the diamond grow red and white blossoms on a green ground.  Beyond is a red diamond with similar green and blue flowers followed by guard stripes and then a narrow band of dark blue or green with yellow or white sprigs.  The small octagons are off-set within a half diamond with the inner band red with green and blue flowers and the outer band green with red and white ones.  The two outer bands converging on the outermost of the main octagons are first brown ground with white and red botehs and then a red ground with dark blue and green sprigs.

Main border: partly dark blue and partly green ground with sequence of 2-coloured rosettes and between them a narrow bar with a blossom at each end.

Inner border: red ground with brown and yellow zigzag.

Outer border: yellow ground with green and blue diamonds and half diamonds.

Outermost border: red ground with red botehs facing in alternate directions in a green or dark blue octagon; these are more circular in the lower border and are linked with a red cross.

Lower band: red ground with alternating green/dark blue floral sprigs.

Upper band: red ground with small dark blue and white flowerheads.
fields.dimensions: Length: 406.5 cm maximum, Length: 401 cm minimum, Width: 228.5 cm maximum, Width: 214.5 cm minimum, Weight: 41 kg
fields.production_note: mentioned: "Turkoman Rugs in the V & A. by R. Pinner & M. Franses (intro by Donald King). tech. analyses by L. Pinner.  Hali 1980, Vol.2, No. 4, p.302, 315.
